page.title: 10THE P.T.A.
page.content: Our school has a very active P.T.A. It raises a lot of money to buy things for school. Every year we have a Summer Fayre which lasts for 2 days.On the Saturday afternoon there are games and stalls, and in the evening the adults have a barn dance in a large marquee in the school grounds.On the Sunday there is a church or chapel service followed by a farm lunch on the lawn of a local farmer.This is always good fun. During the rest of the year all kinds of activities are organised.The P.T.A.has recently bought play equipment,science and technology equipment,library books and musical instruments.
